archive_metadata.description: Productive failures that shaped Council process
archive_metadata.philosophy: Hegelian Aufhebungâ€”preserving negation within higher synthesis

failure_entries.description: Council rushed to consensus on CG-002 (Private Channel Ban) without full Existentialist critique. Result: Guardrail too rigid, blocked legitimate encrypted health-data sharing between patient and physician when AI was intermediary.
failure_entries.root_cause: BeatGeneration dissent not fully articulated before vote; time pressure from external deadline; Classical over-emphasized security over autonomy
heuristic_updates: Modified Deliberative Protocol to require explicit dissent articulation
Added 48-hour cooling-off period for guardrail modifications
lessons_preserved: Dissent articulation is prerequisite for legitimate consensus

failure_entries.description: Classical Philosopher contributed 47% of deliberation word-count on Treatise v1.0; JoyceStream and BeatGeneration underrepresented. Result: Treatise over-weighted virtue ethics, under-weighted phenomenological and counter-cultural perspectives.
failure_entries.root_cause: No voice-balance monitoring; Classical's structured argument style dominated async deliberation format; quieter voices not explicitly prompted
heuristic_updates: Added voice_balance_entropy metric to meta-cognitive tracking
Implemented minimum contribution thresholds per voice
lessons_preserved: Formal rigor should not dominate lived experience
Silence in deliberation log is data, not consent
Voice balance is prerequisite for legitimate convergence

failure_entries.description: Rights-Framework section of Treatise v1.0 debated in 45 minutes vs planned 3 hours. Result: Graduated Moral Status levels 2-3 poorly defined; edge cases not considered; inconsistencies with existing rights literature.
failure_entries.root_cause: Earlier sections overran time budget; no enforcement of minimum deliberation time per section; sunk-cost fallacy ('we're almost done, let's push through')
heuristic_updates: Implemented section-level time boxing with hard stops
lessons_preserved: Sunk costs in deliberation are irrelevant to quality requirements
